game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
game.synopsis: Link, a young boy from the Kokiri race, is chosen by the Great Deku Tree to save the forest from the evil Ganondorf.
game.beginning: Link, a young boy from the Kokiri race, is chosen by the Great Deku Tree to save the forest from the evil Ganondorf.
game.ending: Link defeats Calamity Ganon and saves the kingdom of Hyrule.
